mapper.select: SELECT 관리번호 as id, 공원명 as name, 공원구분 as type, location, 공원면적 as area, 지정고시일 as designatedDate, 관리기관명 as managementAgency FROM parks WHERE 제공기관명 = '서울특별시 종로구' AND location IS NOT NULL AND ST_DWithin( location::geography, #{location, typeHandler=com.zipsoon.common.config.typehandler.PointTypeHandler}::geography, #{radius} );
